title:
Did German U Boat sailors see a movie in Southport during WW II?



A friend of mine swears that during World War II several German sailors from a U Boat off Southport were able to come ashore undetected and go see a movie playing at the cinema in Southport.

He says he has heard others tell the same story and that it really happened.

I know U Boats were active off the NC coast and several were sunk but this seems a little far fetched. Anyone else hear this story? 

Could they be mistakenly be referring to German POWs who might have been allowed to see a movie for good behavior or such?
